description: Environment variables for Instagram-only launch on Netlify

NEXT_PUBLIC_PROVIDER_INSTAGRAM_ENABLED.description: Enable Instagram provider (only active provider for launch)

NEXT_PUBLIC_LAUNCH_INSTAGRAM_ONLY.description: Legacy flag for Instagram-only launch (compatibility only)

instructions.netlify_dashboard: Go to Site Settings > Environment Variables and add each variable
instructions.netlify_cli: Use 'netlify env:set KEY value' for each variable
instructions.note: Tool enablement variables are optional - tools default to enabled when unset

tool_variables_optional.description: Only set these to 'false' if a tool is truly not ready
